jobDescription: Req ID 97871BR Business Title Lead Information Security Architect Group MCIS Location USA CALIFORNIA San Francisco Clearance Level Needed Public Trust Category Cyber Job Duties and Responsibilities Become an integral part of a diverse team that leads the world within our Federal Security Solutions group. At ManTech International Corporation, you will help protect our national security while working on innovative projects that offer opportunities for advancement.  ManTech is looking for a Lead Information Security Architect to join our team.In this role, you will serve as the “deputy” and 2nd in command for theSecurity Architecture team at our customer location in San Francisco.  As part of the security architecture team you will participate insecurity-related activities including planning, design, development,implementation, and testing for all security controls required.  You will also coordinate and review security architecture and engineeringresults from the National IT teams, other District partners, and externalservice providers for technologies located outside the San Francisco District.  You will partner with the IT teams and System Owners to conduct threatmodelling, identify critical security gaps, review existing security controlrequirements, and oversee testing and security assurance activities.  You will own the tools and technologies used by the security teams, thesecurity architecture frameworks including Application Security, the securitydata strategy and big-data environments, and the Security Orchestration andAutomation & Response (SOAR) platforms used by our client.
